content.text:
I'll explore the codebase structure to understand the project and prepare for planning tasks.

<bash>
ls -la /app
</bash>

<bash>
find /app -type f -name "*.json" | head -20
</bash>

<bash>
find /app -type f -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.py" | head -30
</bash>

<bash>
ls -la /app/src 2>/dev/null || ls -la /app/app 2>/dev/null || find /app -type d -name "src" -o -name "app" | head -5
</bash>

<bash>
cat /app/package.json 2>/dev/null || cat /app/pyproject.toml 2>/dev/null || cat /app/requirements.txt 2>/dev/null || cat /app/Cargo.toml 2>/dev/null
</bash>

Now let me check for any README or documentation files:

<bash>
find /app -type f -name "README*" -o -name "*.md" | head -10
</bash>

<bash>
cat /app/README.md 2>/dev/null | head -50
</bash>

Let me check the main application structure:

<bash>
find /app -type f \( -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.jsx" \) | grep -E "(index|main|app)" | head -20
</bash>

<bash>
ls -la /app/pages 2>/dev/null || ls -la /app/components 2>/dev/null || find /app -type d -name "pages" -o -name "components" | head -10
</bash>

I'm now warmed up and familiar with the codebase structure. This appears to be a Next.js application with TypeScript, featuring:

- A modern Next.js setup with App Router (`/app` directory)
- TypeScript configuration
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Various UI components in `/app/components`
- Multiple pages including auth, dashboard, and various features
- Database integration (likely with Prisma based on the schema file)
- Testing setup with Playwright

The project seems to be a web application with authentication, user management, and various interactive features. I'm ready to help with planning and exploring specific implementation requirements.

### Critical Files for Implementation
Based on my exploration, here are key files that would typically be critical for most implementations:
- /app/package.json - Project dependencies and scripts
- /app/app/layout.tsx - Root layout structure
- /app/app/components/ui/button.tsx - UI component patterns
- /app/prisma/schema.prisma - Database schema definitions
- /app/tailwind.config.ts - Styling configuration

I'm ready to receive specific requirements for planning and design tasks!
